{{evento.eventoId}} {{evento.tema}} {{evento.local}} {{evento.dataEvento}} {{evento.qtdPessoas}} {{evento.lote}}

Nenhum evento encontrado!
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent { public eventos: any = []; widthImg: number = 50; marginImg: number = 2; isImageCollapsed: boolean = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } changeIsImageCollapsedEvent(){ this.isImageCollapsed = !this.isImageCollapsed; } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('http://localhost:5216/api/eventos').subscribe({ next: (response) => this.eventos = response, error: (e) => console.log(e) }); } }
